meanings.sent1: She lived a nonascetic life, enjoying all the pleasures she could.
meanings.sent2: The nonascetic approach to dieting allows for indulgence in all kinds of food.
meanings.sent3: Even though he tried to be nonascetic, he couldn't resist the temptation of the chocolate cake.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a nonascetic explosion of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The nonascetic party was filled with music, laughter, and delicious treats.

meanings.definition: Not adhering to ascetic practices or principles.
meanings.sent1: The nonascetic monk enjoyed the comforts of a soft bed and warm meals.
meanings.sent2: Living a nonascetic lifestyle, she surrounded herself with luxurious items.
meanings.sent3: The nonascetic approach to exercise involved lounging on the couch all day.
meanings.sent4: His nonascetic attitude towards work led to a cluttered desk and missed deadlines.
meanings.sent5: The nonascetic garden was a paradise of blooming flowers and fragrant herbs.
